title: Is record of past misconduct of the perpetrator of domestic violence of any relevance in giving relief to victim of domestic violence?
content: Yes, the past conduct of the perpetrator of domestic violence assumes significance in deciding about the ex-parte / interim relief, and the subsequent relief to be granted to the victim of domestic violence under the PWDVA, 2005 and formulation and assessment of the ‘Safety Plan’ to secure the future of the victim.
